Effect Systems supports you to prolong the life and maintain the value of your broadcast and media technology with advanced repair solutions. Find out how we can help keep your systems and media operations running effectively: Advan | Grass Valley, SAM & Quantel Specialist Engineers We specialise in GV (Grass Valley), SAM (Snell Advanced Media), and Quantel SQ (including LiveTouch) and IQ support and repair, with over 100 years combined experience we deliver expert services to keep your SQ and IQ systems working in the front line of broadcast. From system configuration and support to equipment diagnostics and repair, our services empower broadcasters, manufacturers, distributors, and end users to optimise their media operations and keep technology working for longer. Given this finding, as well as the earlier discrepancy found in the company registration dates, I will need to make a final determination on the legitimacy of the website. Based on the observations, it's time to make a final assessment. Based on the available information, the website does not exhibit the majority of the characteristics associated with fraudulent sites. Despite the privacy policy page being inaccessible, which is a concern, there are no unusually low prices or claims of free products, the company is registered and has a long history, the contact details appear appropriate for a business, and there are positive reviews found online. The discrepancy in registration dates could be due to a difference in the entity or a database error. Without further evidence of fraudulent behavior, the site cannot be conclusively labeled as fraudulent.
